chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: ALEPH
items.plainText: ALEPH

items.text: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the LORD.
items.plainText: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the LORD.

items.text: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.
items.plainText: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.

items.text: They also do no iniquity: they walk in his ways.
items.plainText: They also do no iniquity: they walk in his ways.

items.text: Thou hast commanded us to keep thy precepts diligently.
items.plainText: Thou hast commanded us to keep thy precepts diligently.

items.text: O that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes!
items.plainText: O that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes!

items.text: Then shall I not be ashamed, when I have respect unto all thy commandments.
items.plainText: Then shall I not be ashamed, when I have respect unto all thy commandments.

items.text: I will praise thee with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.
items.plainText: I will praise thee with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.

items.text: I will keep thy statutes: O forsake me not utterly.
items.plainText: I will keep thy statutes: O forsake me not utterly.

items.text: BETH
items.plainText: BETH

items.text: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word.
items.plainText: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word.

items.text: With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.
items.plainText: With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.

items.text: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.
items.plainText: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.

items.text: Blessed art thou, O LORD: teach me thy statutes.
items.plainText: Blessed art thou, O LORD: teach me thy statutes.

items.text: With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth.
items.plainText: With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth.

items.text: I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, as much as in all riches.
items.plainText: I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, as much as in all riches.

items.text: I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.
items.plainText: I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.

items.text: I will delight myself in thy statutes: I will not forget thy word.
items.plainText: I will delight myself in thy statutes: I will not forget thy word.

items.text: GIMEL
items.plainText: GIMEL

items.text: Deal bountifully with thy servant, that I may live, and keep thy word.
items.plainText: Deal bountifully with thy servant, that I may live, and keep thy word.

items.text: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.
items.plainText: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.

items.text: I am a stranger in the earth: hide not thy commandments from me.
items.plainText: I am a stranger in the earth: hide not thy commandments from me.

items.text: My soul breaketh for the longing that it hath unto thy judgments at all times.
items.plainText: My soul breaketh for the longing that it hath unto thy judgments at all times.

items.text: Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed, which do err from thy commandments.
items.plainText: Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed, which do err from thy commandments.

items.text: Remove from me reproach and contempt; for I have kept thy testimonies.
items.plainText: Remove from me reproach and contempt; for I have kept thy testimonies.

items.text: Princes also did sit and speak against me: but thy servant did meditate in thy statutes.
items.plainText: Princes also did sit and speak against me: but thy servant did meditate in thy statutes.

items.text: Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors.
items.plainText: Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors.

items.text: DALETH
items.plainText: DALETH

items.text: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken thou me according to thy word.
items.plainText: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken thou me according to thy word.

items.text: I have declared my ways, and thou heardest me: teach me thy statutes.
items.plainText: I have declared my ways, and thou heardest me: teach me thy statutes.

items.text: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: so shall I talk of thy wondrous works.
items.plainText: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: so shall I talk of thy wondrous works.

items.text: My soul melteth for heaviness: strengthen thou me according unto thy word.
items.plainText: My soul melteth for heaviness: strengthen thou me according unto thy word.

items.text: Remove from me the way of lying: and grant me thy law graciously.
items.plainText: Remove from me the way of lying: and grant me thy law graciously.

items.text: I have chosen the way of truth: thy judgments have I laid before me.
items.plainText: I have chosen the way of truth: thy judgments have I laid before me.

items.text: I have stuck unto thy testimonies: O LORD, put me not to shame.
items.plainText: I have stuck unto thy testimonies: O LORD, put me not to shame.

items.text: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.
items.plainText: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.

items.text: HE
items.plainText: HE

items.text: Teach me, O LORD, the way of thy statutes; and I shall keep it unto the end.
items.plainText: Teach me, O LORD, the way of thy statutes; and I shall keep it unto the end.

items.text: Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law; yea, I shall observe it with my whole heart.
items.plainText: Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law; yea, I shall observe it with my whole heart.

items.text: Make me to go in the path of thy commandments; for therein do I delight.
items.plainText: Make me to go in the path of thy commandments; for therein do I delight.

items.text: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to covetousness.
items.plainText: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to covetousness.

items.text: Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; and quicken thou me in thy way.
items.plainText: Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; and quicken thou me in thy way.

items.text: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.
items.plainText: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.

items.text: Turn away my reproach which I fear: for thy judgments are good.
items.plainText: Turn away my reproach which I fear: for thy judgments are good.

items.text: Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: quicken me in thy righteousness.
items.plainText: Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: quicken me in thy righteousness.

items.text: VAU
items.plainText: VAU

items.text: Let thy mercies come also unto me, O LORD, even thy salvation, according to thy word.
items.plainText: Let thy mercies come also unto me, O LORD, even thy salvation, according to thy word.

items.text: So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: for I trust in thy word.
items.plainText: So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: for I trust in thy word.

items.text: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; for I have hoped in thy judgments.
items.plainText: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; for I have hoped in thy judgments.

items.text: So shall I keep thy law continually for ever and ever.
items.plainText: So shall I keep thy law continually for ever and ever.

items.text: And I will walk at liberty: for I seek thy precepts.
items.plainText: And I will walk at liberty: for I seek thy precepts.

items.text: I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings, and will not be ashamed.
items.plainText: I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings, and will not be ashamed.

items.text: And I will delight myself in thy commandments, which I have loved.
items.plainText: And I will delight myself in thy commandments, which I have loved.

items.text: My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments, which I have loved; and I will meditate in thy statutes.
items.plainText: My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments, which I have loved; and I will meditate in thy statutes.

items.text: ZAIN
items.plainText: ZAIN

items.text: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.
items.plainText: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.

items.text: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.
items.plainText: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.

items.text: The proud have had me greatly in derision: yet have I not declined from thy law.
items.plainText: The proud have had me greatly in derision: yet have I not declined from thy law.

items.text: I remembered thy judgments of old, O LORD; and have comforted myself.
items.plainText: I remembered thy judgments of old, O LORD; and have comforted myself.

items.text: Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked that forsake thy law.
items.plainText: Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked that forsake thy law.

items.text: Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage.
items.plainText: Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage.

items.text: I have remembered thy name, O LORD, in the night, and have kept thy law.
items.plainText: I have remembered thy name, O LORD, in the night, and have kept thy law.

items.text: This I had, because I kept thy precepts.
items.plainText: This I had, because I kept thy precepts.

items.text: CHETH
items.plainText: CHETH

items.text: Thou art my portion, O LORD: I have said that I would keep thy words.
items.plainText: Thou art my portion, O LORD: I have said that I would keep thy words.

items.text: I intreated thy favour with my whole heart: be merciful unto me according to thy word.
items.plainText: I intreated thy favour with my whole heart: be merciful unto me according to thy word.

items.text: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
items.plainText: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.

items.text: I made haste, and delayed not to keep thy commandments.
items.plainText: I made haste, and delayed not to keep thy commandments.

items.text: The bands of the wicked have robbed me: but I have not forgotten thy law.
items.plainText: The bands of the wicked have robbed me: but I have not forgotten thy law.

items.text: At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee because of thy righteous judgments.
items.plainText: At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee because of thy righteous judgments.

items.text: I am a companion of all them that fear thee, and of them that keep thy precepts.
items.plainText: I am a companion of all them that fear thee, and of them that keep thy precepts.

items.text: The earth, O LORD, is full of thy mercy: teach me thy statutes.
items.plainText: The earth, O LORD, is full of thy mercy: teach me thy statutes.

items.text: TETH
items.plainText: TETH

items.text: Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O LORD, according unto thy word.
items.plainText: Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O LORD, according unto thy word.

items.text: Teach me good judgment and knowledge: for I have believed thy commandments.
items.plainText: Teach me good judgment and knowledge: for I have believed thy commandments.

items.text: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.
items.plainText: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.

items.text: Thou art good, and doest good; teach me thy statutes.
items.plainText: Thou art good, and doest good; teach me thy statutes.

items.text: The proud have forged a lie against me: but I will keep thy precepts with my whole heart.
items.plainText: The proud have forged a lie against me: but I will keep thy precepts with my whole heart.

items.text: Their heart is as fat as grease; but I delight in thy law.
items.plainText: Their heart is as fat as grease; but I delight in thy law.

items.text: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.
items.plainText: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.

items.text: The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver.
items.plainText: The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver.

items.text: JOD
items.plainText: JOD

items.text: Thy hands have made me and fashioned me: give me understanding, that I may learn thy commandments.
items.plainText: Thy hands have made me and fashioned me: give me understanding, that I may learn thy commandments.

items.text: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; because I have hoped in thy word.
items.plainText: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; because I have hoped in thy word.

items.text: I know, O LORD, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.
items.plainText: I know, O LORD, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.

items.text: Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness be for my comfort, according to thy word unto thy servant.
items.plainText: Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness be for my comfort, according to thy word unto thy servant.

items.text: Let thy tender mercies come unto me, that I may live: for thy law is my delight.
items.plainText: Let thy tender mercies come unto me, that I may live: for thy law is my delight.

items.text: Let the proud be ashamed; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause: but I will meditate in thy precepts.
items.plainText: Let the proud be ashamed; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause: but I will meditate in thy precepts.

items.text: Let those that fear thee turn unto me, and those that have known thy testimonies.
items.plainText: Let those that fear thee turn unto me, and those that have known thy testimonies.

items.text: Let my heart be sound in thy statutes; that I be not ashamed.
items.plainText: Let my heart be sound in thy statutes; that I be not ashamed.

items.text: CAPH
items.plainText: CAPH

items.text: My soul fainteth for thy salvation: but I hope in thy word.
items.plainText: My soul fainteth for thy salvation: but I hope in thy word.

items.text: Mine eyes fail for thy word, saying, When wilt thou comfort me?
items.plainText: Mine eyes fail for thy word, saying, When wilt thou comfort me?

items.text: For I am become like a bottle in the smoke; yet do I not forget thy statutes.
items.plainText: For I am become like a bottle in the smoke; yet do I not forget thy statutes.

items.text: How many are the days of thy servant? when wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?
items.plainText: How many are the days of thy servant? when wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?

items.text: The proud have digged pits for me, which are not after thy law.
items.plainText: The proud have digged pits for me, which are not after thy law.

items.text: All thy commandments are faithful: they persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.
items.plainText: All thy commandments are faithful: they persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.

items.text: They had almost consumed me upon earth; but I forsook not thy precepts.
items.plainText: They had almost consumed me upon earth; but I forsook not thy precepts.

items.text: Quicken me after thy lovingkindness; so shall I keep the testimony of thy mouth.
items.plainText: Quicken me after thy lovingkindness; so shall I keep the testimony of thy mouth.

items.text: LAMED
items.plainText: LAMED

items.text: For ever, O LORD, thy word is settled in heaven.
items.plainText: For ever, O LORD, thy word is settled in heaven.

items.text: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.
items.plainText: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.

items.text: They continue this day according to thine ordinances: for all are thy servants.
items.plainText: They continue this day according to thine ordinances: for all are thy servants.

items.text: Unless thy law had been my delights, I should then have perished in mine affliction.
items.plainText: Unless thy law had been my delights, I should then have perished in mine affliction.

items.text: I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me.
items.plainText: I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me.

items.text: I am thine, save me; for I have sought thy precepts.
items.plainText: I am thine, save me; for I have sought thy precepts.

items.text: The wicked have waited for me to destroy me: but I will consider thy testimonies.
items.plainText: The wicked have waited for me to destroy me: but I will consider thy testimonies.

items.text: I have seen an end of all perfection: but thy commandment is exceeding broad.
items.plainText: I have seen an end of all perfection: but thy commandment is exceeding broad.

items.text: MEM
items.plainText: MEM

items.text: O how love I thy law! it is my meditation all the day.
items.plainText: O how love I thy law! it is my meditation all the day.

items.text: Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies: for they are ever with me.
items.plainText: Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies: for they are ever with me.

items.text: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.
items.plainText: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.

items.text: I understand more than the ancients, because I keep thy precepts.
items.plainText: I understand more than the ancients, because I keep thy precepts.

items.text: I have refrained my feet from every evil way, that I might keep thy word.
items.plainText: I have refrained my feet from every evil way, that I might keep thy word.

items.text: I have not departed from thy judgments: for thou hast taught me.
items.plainText: I have not departed from thy judgments: for thou hast taught me.

items.text: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!
items.plainText: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

items.text: Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.
items.plainText: Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.

items.text: NUN
items.plainText: NUN

items.text: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
items.plainText: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

items.text: I have sworn, and I will perform it, that I will keep thy righteous judgments.
items.plainText: I have sworn, and I will perform it, that I will keep thy righteous judgments.

items.text: I am afflicted very much: quicken me, O LORD, according unto thy word.
items.plainText: I am afflicted very much: quicken me, O LORD, according unto thy word.

items.text: Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O LORD, and teach me thy judgments.
items.plainText: Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O LORD, and teach me thy judgments.

items.text: My soul is continually in my hand: yet do I not forget thy law.
items.plainText: My soul is continually in my hand: yet do I not forget thy law.

items.text: The wicked have laid a snare for me: yet I erred not from thy precepts.
items.plainText: The wicked have laid a snare for me: yet I erred not from thy precepts.

items.text: Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever: for they are the rejoicing of my heart.
items.plainText: Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever: for they are the rejoicing of my heart.

items.text: I have inclined mine heart to perform thy statutes alway, even unto the end.
items.plainText: I have inclined mine heart to perform thy statutes alway, even unto the end.

items.text: SAMECH
items.plainText: SAMECH

items.text: I hate vain thoughts: but thy law do I love.
items.plainText: I hate vain thoughts: but thy law do I love.

items.text: Thou art my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.
items.plainText: Thou art my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.

items.text: Depart from me, ye evildoers: for I will keep the commandments of my God.
items.plainText: Depart from me, ye evildoers: for I will keep the commandments of my God.

items.text: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.
items.plainText: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.

items.text: Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe: and I will have respect unto thy statutes continually.
items.plainText: Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe: and I will have respect unto thy statutes continually.

items.text: Thou hast trodden down all them that err from thy statutes: for their deceit is falsehood.
items.plainText: Thou hast trodden down all them that err from thy statutes: for their deceit is falsehood.

items.text: Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross: therefore I love thy testimonies.
items.plainText: Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross: therefore I love thy testimonies.

items.text: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; and I am afraid of thy judgments.
items.plainText: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; and I am afraid of thy judgments.

items.text: AIN
items.plainText: AIN

items.text: I have done judgment and justice: leave me not to mine oppressors.
items.plainText: I have done judgment and justice: leave me not to mine oppressors.

items.text: Be surety for thy servant for good: let not the proud oppress me.
items.plainText: Be surety for thy servant for good: let not the proud oppress me.

items.text: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, and for the word of thy righteousness.
items.plainText: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, and for the word of thy righteousness.

items.text: Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy, and teach me thy statutes.
items.plainText: Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy, and teach me thy statutes.

items.text: I am thy servant; give me understanding, that I may know thy testimonies.
items.plainText: I am thy servant; give me understanding, that I may know thy testimonies.

items.text: It is time for thee, LORD, to work: for they have made void thy law.
items.plainText: It is time for thee, LORD, to work: for they have made void thy law.

items.text: Therefore I love thy commandments above gold; yea, above fine gold.
items.plainText: Therefore I love thy commandments above gold; yea, above fine gold.

items.text: Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right; and I hate every false way.
items.plainText: Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right; and I hate every false way.

items.text: PE
items.plainText: PE

items.text: Thy testimonies are wonderful: therefore doth my soul keep them.
items.plainText: Thy testimonies are wonderful: therefore doth my soul keep them.

items.text: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.
items.plainText: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.

items.text: I opened my mouth, and panted: for I longed for thy commandments.
items.plainText: I opened my mouth, and panted: for I longed for thy commandments.

items.text: Look thou upon me, and be merciful unto me, as thou usest to do unto those that love thy name.
items.plainText: Look thou upon me, and be merciful unto me, as thou usest to do unto those that love thy name.

items.text: Order my steps in thy word: and let not any iniquity have dominion over me.
items.plainText: Order my steps in thy word: and let not any iniquity have dominion over me.

items.text: Deliver me from the oppression of man: so will I keep thy precepts.
items.plainText: Deliver me from the oppression of man: so will I keep thy precepts.

items.text: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant; and teach me thy statutes.
items.plainText: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant; and teach me thy statutes.

items.text: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, because they keep not thy law.
items.plainText: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, because they keep not thy law.

items.text: TZADDI
items.plainText: TZADDI

items.text: Righteous art thou, O LORD, and upright are thy judgments.
items.plainText: Righteous art thou, O LORD, and upright are thy judgments.

items.text: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.
items.plainText: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.

items.text: My zeal hath consumed me, because mine enemies have forgotten thy words.
items.plainText: My zeal hath consumed me, because mine enemies have forgotten thy words.

items.text: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.
items.plainText: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.

items.text: I am small and despised: yet do not I forget thy precepts.
items.plainText: I am small and despised: yet do not I forget thy precepts.

items.text: Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, and thy law is the truth.
items.plainText: Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, and thy law is the truth.

items.text: Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me: yet thy commandments are my delights.
items.plainText: Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me: yet thy commandments are my delights.

items.text: The righteousness of thy testimonies is everlasting: give me understanding, and I shall live.
items.plainText: The righteousness of thy testimonies is everlasting: give me understanding, and I shall live.

items.text: KOPH
items.plainText: KOPH

items.text: I cried with my whole heart; hear me, O LORD: I will keep thy statutes.
items.plainText: I cried with my whole heart; hear me, O LORD: I will keep thy statutes.

items.text: I cried unto thee; save me, and I shall keep thy testimonies.
items.plainText: I cried unto thee; save me, and I shall keep thy testimonies.

items.text: I prevented the dawning of the morning, and cried: I hoped in thy word.
items.plainText: I prevented the dawning of the morning, and cried: I hoped in thy word.

items.text: Mine eyes prevent the night watches, that I might meditate in thy word.
items.plainText: Mine eyes prevent the night watches, that I might meditate in thy word.

items.text: Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness: O LORD, quicken me according to thy judgment.
items.plainText: Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness: O LORD, quicken me according to thy judgment.

items.text: They draw nigh that follow after mischief: they are far from thy law.
items.plainText: They draw nigh that follow after mischief: they are far from thy law.

items.text: Thou art near, O LORD; and all thy commandments are truth.
items.plainText: Thou art near, O LORD; and all thy commandments are truth.

items.text: Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever.
items.plainText: Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever.

items.text: RESH
items.plainText: RESH

items.text: Consider mine affliction, and deliver me: for I do not forget thy law.
items.plainText: Consider mine affliction, and deliver me: for I do not forget thy law.

items.text: Plead my cause, and deliver me: quicken me according to thy word.
items.plainText: Plead my cause, and deliver me: quicken me according to thy word.

items.text: Salvation is far from the wicked: for they seek not thy statutes.
items.plainText: Salvation is far from the wicked: for they seek not thy statutes.

items.text: Great are thy tender mercies, O LORD: quicken me according to thy judgments.
items.plainText: Great are thy tender mercies, O LORD: quicken me according to thy judgments.

items.text: Many are my persecutors and mine enemies; yet do I not decline from thy testimonies.
items.plainText: Many are my persecutors and mine enemies; yet do I not decline from thy testimonies.

items.text: I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved; because they kept not thy word.
items.plainText: I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved; because they kept not thy word.

items.text: Consider how I love thy precepts: quicken me, O LORD, according to thy lovingkindness.
items.plainText: Consider how I love thy precepts: quicken me, O LORD, according to thy lovingkindness.

items.text: Thy word is true from the beginning: and every one of thy righteous judgments endureth for ever.
items.plainText: Thy word is true from the beginning: and every one of thy righteous judgments endureth for ever.

items.text: SCHIN
items.plainText: SCHIN

items.text: Princes have persecuted me without a cause: but my heart standeth in awe of thy word.
items.plainText: Princes have persecuted me without a cause: but my heart standeth in awe of thy word.

items.text: I rejoice at thy word, as one that findeth great spoil.
items.plainText: I rejoice at thy word, as one that findeth great spoil.

items.text: I hate and abhor lying: but thy law do I love.
items.plainText: I hate and abhor lying: but thy law do I love.

items.text: Seven times a day do I praise thee because of thy righteous judgments.
items.plainText: Seven times a day do I praise thee because of thy righteous judgments.

items.text: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.
items.plainText: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.

items.text: LORD, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments.
items.plainText: LORD, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments.

items.text: My soul hath kept thy testimonies; and I love them exceedingly.
items.plainText: My soul hath kept thy testimonies; and I love them exceedingly.

items.text: I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies: for all my ways are before thee.
items.plainText: I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies: for all my ways are before thee.

items.text: TAU
items.plainText: TAU

items.text: Let my cry come near before thee, O LORD: give me understanding according to thy word.
items.plainText: Let my cry come near before thee, O LORD: give me understanding according to thy word.

items.text: Let my supplication come before thee: deliver me according to thy word.
items.plainText: Let my supplication come before thee: deliver me according to thy word.

items.text: My lips shall utter praise, when thou hast taught me thy statutes.
items.plainText: My lips shall utter praise, when thou hast taught me thy statutes.

items.text: My tongue shall speak of thy word: for all thy commandments are righteousness.
items.plainText: My tongue shall speak of thy word: for all thy commandments are righteousness.

items.text: Let thine hand help me; for I have chosen thy precepts.
items.plainText: Let thine hand help me; for I have chosen thy precepts.

items.text: I have longed for thy salvation, O LORD; and thy law is my delight.
items.plainText: I have longed for thy salvation, O LORD; and thy law is my delight.

items.text: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.
items.plainText: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.

items.text: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.
items.plainText: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.
